views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 7, 8, 9,10, 11 and 12

Tested on iOS 10 only, iPhone X not supported.

Display a bar in the status bar that represents the current battery level.

Ability to:
- Change status bar color (add background if needed)
- Hide Battery and/or Charging Icon
- Customize Bar (position, style, color)
- Customize charging animation

Configure options from Settings.

Fix memory leak on preference change - Added a sway charging animation
- Added a slider to configure the height of the bar
- Improved pulse charging animation (initial glitch on device plug-in)
- Added support for Lithium Ion
- Added option to update bar at every battery level instead of every 5 levels
